note:
Lived & worked in 6 continents. Speak Spanish. Meditate. Stand up 4 everyone. Attended million man march. 6ft2. Very funny in talking. WhatsApp +447341446247

I'm autistic.
Some of my replies might read as if I'm saying them sharply; but all my replies are said gently.

Not everyone who is autistic etc will say that they are or has been diagnosed as such yet; so it might be best to assume that everyone is gentle in their words just in case.

name: Favorite Books
value: The Power of Now by Eckhart Tolle.  The Autobiography of Malcolm X. Beloved. The Temple of My Familiar. Anything by Toni Morrison, Octavia E Butler, Alice Walker, James Baldwin, Iain Banks and most black authors of their calibre.
